description: Try our easy to follow Traditional Iced Christmas Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Traditional Iced Christmas Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To decorate the edge of the marzipan, use the round tip of a spoon. Hold the spoon, with the back of the spoon facing upwards, and press the spoon into the icing to mark. Transfer the cake to a cake stand or covered cake board and tie with ribbon to decorate.
